items.sentence: It looks like you finally found your calling.
I didn\'t know that you were French teachers.
I didn\'t know that you were so unhappy here.
I couldn\'t answer any questions on the test.
I didn\'t buy everything Tom asked me to buy.
This is the worst hamburger I\'ve ever eaten.
I can\'t leave work today until six o\'clock.
Do you have anything I can take for the pain?
Tom didn\'t tell Mary when he\'d be arriving.
Let\'s do something we\'ve never done before.
Tom won\'t speak to me and I don\'t know why.
You can\'t exactly blame Tom for what he did.
I had to drop something off at Tom\'s office.
What are we going to have for dinner tonight?
What was your hobby when you were a teenager?
How many French books did you read last year?
Tom isn\'t the one who asked Mary to do that.
Tom isn\'t well enough to go to school today.
Tom acted like he wasn\'t interested in Mary.
You\'re not yet old enough to drive, are you?
You\'re really getting prettier and prettier.
You\'re supposed to be helping Tom right now.
I don\'t think anybody could\'ve stopped Tom.
I don\'t think that I like Tom\'s suggestion.
I don\'t think that I need Tom\'s permission.
Didn\'t you know that Tom also speaks French?
Those dogs aren\'t as ferocious as they look.
Tom doesn\'t want to go to the beach with us.
Tom drinks tea, but he doesn\'t drink coffee.
Tom drinks, but he\'s not drunk this morning.
Perhaps Tom knows more than he\'s telling us.
Tom is the only one who can help you do that.
Do you know when Tom started studying French?
Do you mind if I ask you a personal question?
Do you really believe that Tom would do that?
Tom sold his house in Boston a long time ago.
Tom sounds like he grew up singing in church.
Tom didn\'t know he had to help Mary do that.
A reasonable person wouldn\'t have done that.
Let\'s do something different this afternoon.
Let\'s have another round of beers over here.
This is just what Tom didn\'t want to happen.
This is one of the shortest books I\'ve read.
Do you have any idea where we might find Tom?
Did you really think I wasn\'t going to help?
Did you really think Tom was Mary\'s brother?
We just celebrated our thirtieth anniversary.
I don\'t like you going out with my daughter.
I don\'t really want to go swimming with Tom.
I wish we didn\'t have to do this any longer.
